2.text: Park the car on a flat even surface.

3.vid: /3/32/Check Oil Level in Car Step 3 Version 5.360p.mp4

4.vid: /4/45/Check Oil Level in Car Step 4 Version 5.360p.mp4

5.text: Get some paper towels or an old rag.

6.vid: /c/c0/Check Oil Level in Car Step 6 Version 5.360p.mp4

7.text: Examine the color and quality of the oil.

8.text: Dry off the dipstick and dip it once more into the hole.
8.vid: /3/31/Check Oil Level in Car Step 8 Version 5.360p.mp4

9.vid: /7/7f/Check Oil Level in Car Step 9 Version 5.360p.mp4

10.vid: /7/71/Check Oil Level in Car Step 10 Version 3.360p.mp4

11.text: Locate the oil fill cap located on top of your engine.
11.vid: /b/be/Check Oil Level in Car Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.text: Add the appropriate oil in small increments.
12.vid: /2/24/Check Oil Level in Car Step 12 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.vid: /b/bd/Check Oil Level in Car Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4
